definitions: the action or process of earning revenue from an asset, business, etc.

examples.text: the network supports the distribution and monetization of online content to any type of site or device
he will focus on retention and monetization strategies

shortDefinitions: action of earning revenue from asset, etc.

definitions: the conversion of an asset, debt, etc. into cash or a form easily converted into cash

examples.text: the trust is actively reviewing the monetization of a portion of its assets to reduce indebtedness
the central bank should have long ago embarked upon a policy of aggressive debt monetization

definitions: the conversion or adaptation of a society, economy, etc. to trade based on the exchange of money

examples.text: the growth of the cattle trade spurred the monetization of the Highland economy

shortDefinitions: conversion or adaptation of society to trade based on exchange of money
